This is the official Mastodon account for Democrats Abroad, the Democratic Party arm for the millions of Americans living outside the US. We strive to provide Americans abroad with a Democratic voice in our government and to elect Democratic candidates by mobilizing the overseas vote.

If you're a US citizen who lives abroad, YOU CAN VOTE in the upcoming #2024Election.

To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.

Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
